title: [Large-scale] e-Learning Motivation Design for Real-Time Online Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: Language learning design enhancing real-time interaction and motivation in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can improve intrinsic motivation for language learning by 30% or more in online environments
Learners complete 90% or more of structured learning activities provided on e-learning platforms
Learners perform 80% or more of language tasks through user-friendly interfaces accessible via mobile devices
Learners document four or more meaningful learning experiences through real-time interactions with peers and instructors

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
